title: Law relating to the Criminal Procedure
title_en: Law relating to the Criminal Procedure

provisions.title: Article 267 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 19/09/2019 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) Dr NGIRENTE Edouard Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice /Attorney General
